original_text: While they were walking down the mountain, Jesus said to the three disciples, ‘You must not tell anyone now about the things that you have just seen. One day the Son of Man will become alive again after his death. Then you can tell people about these things.’
korean_text: 그들이 산에서 내려올 때에 예수께서 경고하시되 인자가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아날 때까지는 본 것을 아무에게도 이르지 말라 하시니

sentences.original_text: While they were walking down the mountain
Jesus said to the three disciples
about the things that you have just seen
One day the Son of Man
will become alive again after his death

sentences.korean_translation: 그때 너희는 사람들에게 말할 수 있다
